text: Dumb Dicks (1932) is an American Pre-Code comedy film directed by Ralph Ceder and starring Benny Rubin. ==Plot summary== Two incompetent private detectives pose as swamis in order to infiltrate a gang of bank robbers. ==Cast== *Tim Seals *Benny Rubin as Detective Rubin *Heinie Conklin *Billy Franey *Harry Gribbon ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1932 films Category:American films Category:1932 comedy films Category:RKO Pictures short films Category:English-language films Category:American comedy films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Comedy short films Category:1932 short films
title: Dumb Dicks
